code: function shadeColor(color,percent){var f=parseInt(color.slice(1),16);var t=percent<0?0:255;var p=percent<0?percent*-1:percent;var R=f>>16;var G=f>>8&0x00ff;var B=f&0x0000ff;return"#".concat((0x1000000+(Math.round((t-R)*p)+R)*0x10000+(Math.round((t-G)*p)+G)*0x100+(Math.round((t-B)*p)+B)).toString(16).slice(1));}export default shadeColor;
